alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 18 at 2:28PM MST until December 22 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From Noon Wednesday to 6 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will be coldest Wednesday night through early Thursday afternoon.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
